name: Burnt Caramel Manhattan
description: The Burnt Caramel Manhattan is a sweet, decadent variation on the classic Manhattan.
directions: Chill a cocktail glass with ice and soda.
Fill a mixing glass with ice and then add all ingredients.
Using a bar spoon, stir the drink for approximately 20 seconds.
When stirring, always ensure the glass is topped up with ice.
Taste and then strain into the chilled cocktail glass, serving straight up.
Note: You can vary this by increasing buttershot schnapps and vermouth to .5 oz.
